msbt.message: Oh, hey there, ! Been lookin' for ya. Got a little surprise: a festive wreath!
We're comin' up on Toy Day, so I thought you might want it for your door, . Hang it up if you feel like it, but no hard feelings if it's corny or whatever.
Oh, hang on! Your pockets are full already. Let me know when you've got a free hand, .
